plot: An alien comnes to check out Earth disguised as a dining chair. Helped by a friend, Stephen, he makes confused reports back to his superiors, Cosmic 1 and Cosmic 2 on the planet Holgon.
plot_en: An alien comnes to check out Earth disguised as a dining chair. Helped by a friend, Stephen, he makes confused reports back to his superiors, Cosmic 1 and Cosmic 2 on the planet Holgon.

title: Helping Henry
